pages.text: 23|105|(avareat parayappetum:) enre drstantannal ninnalkk otikelpikkappettirunnille? appeal ninnal avaye nisedhiccu tallukayayirunnuvallea
23|106|avar parayum: nannalute raksitave, nannalute nirbhagyam nannale atijayiccu kalannu. nannal valipilacca oru janavibhagamayippeayi
23|107|nannalute raksitave, nannale ni itil ninn purattu keant varename. ini nannal (durmargattilekk tanne) matannukayanenkil tirccayayum nannal akramikal tanneyayirikkum
23|108|avan (allahu) parayum: ninnal avitettanne nindyarayikkaliyuka. ninnal enneat mintippeakarutâ€Œ

23|109|tirccayayum enre dasanmaril oru vibhagam iprakaram parayaruntayirunnu. nannalute raksitave, nannal visvasiccirikkunnu. atinal nannalkk ni pearuttutarikayum, nannaleat karuna kanikkukayum ceyyename. ni karunikaril uttamananallea
23|110|appeal ninnal avare parihasapatramakkukayan ceytatâ€Œ. annane ninnalkk ennepparriyulla orma marannupeakan avar oru karanamayittirnnu. ninnal avare pucchiccu ciriccu keantirikkukayayirunnu
23|111|avar ksamiccatu keant innita nanavarkk pratiphalam nalkiyirikkunnu. atentennal avar tanneyakunnu bhagyavanmar
23|112|avan (allahu) ceadikkum: bhumiyil ninnal tamasicca keallannalute ennam etrayakunnu
23|113|avar parayum: nannal oru divasamea, oru divasattinre alpabhagamea tamasiccittuntakum. ennittittappetuttiyavareat ni ceadiccu neakkuka
23|114|avan parayum: ninnal alpam matrame tamasiccittullu. ninnalat manas'silakkunnavarayirunnenkil(etra nannayirunnene)
23|115|appeal nam ninnale vrtha srsticcatanennum, nam'mute atukkalekk ninnal matakkappetukayillennum ninnal kanakkakkiyirikkukayanea
23|116|ennal yathart'tha rajavaya allahu unnatanayirikkunnu. avanallate yatearu daivavumilla. mahattaya sinhasanattinre nathanatre avan

23|117|vallavanum allahuveateappam marr valla daivatteyum vilicc prart'thikkunna paksam- atin avanre pakkal yatearu pramanavum illa tanne - avanre vicarana avanre raksitavinre atukkal veccutanneyayirikkum. satyanisedhikal vijayam prapikkukayilla; tircca
23|118|(nabiye,) parayuka: enre raksitave, ni pearuttutarikayum karuna kanikkukayum ceyyename. ni karunikaril erravum uttamananallea
